arcade.patch.env.location

Class CoordinateXYZ

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.env.location.Coordinate
      • arcade.patch.env.location.CoordinateXYZ

  • public final class CoordinateXYZ
extends Coordinate
    Representation of (x, y, z) coordinates.

    Each coordinate is defined by (x, y, z) values. Two coordinate objects are considered equal if they have matching (x, y, z) values.
